functions.tag:
{author:"A Noblewoman of Tyre",title:"Epitaph of Tyre",resolved:1b,pages:["I am a noblewoman of Tyre.

My name is unknown.

My identity shall not be remembered.

To you who crosses this threshold, beware of me. Beware of what I will become.

No one shall know me,","but nevertheless I will continue to do my best to help them all.

This is the way it has always been, and also the way I want it to be.

Now, I believe...

Fate's Puppeteer awaits.

Take care of your","legacy. They may not know why, but why is all that matters to you."]}
